Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    ui.CheckersTextConsole.getAnotherMove(int[])
    Multi-jump functionality removed for 1.1 Gets a follow-up move from the user.
    ui.CheckersTextConsole.requestAnotherOMove()
    Multi-jump functionality removed for 1.1 Prompts player O to input a follow-up move after a jump.
    ui.CheckersTextConsole.requestAnotherXMove()
    Multi-jump functionality removed for 1.1 Prompts player X to input a follow-up move after a jump.
